entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He and Hermione jumped to their feet and drew their wands when something strange happened.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who also jumped to her feet and drew her wand.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's and Hermione's. They are looking for him in the crowd.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who appears in the crowd with Tonks, shouting 'Protego!'

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a person who appears in the crowd with Lupin, shouting 'Protego!'

entities.name: silver cat
entities.description: A silver cat appears and then vanishes.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: The Patronus is an object that has landed in the place where it spread cold ripples of silence.

entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is a location with protective enchantments around it.

entities.name: dance floor
entities.description: The dance floor is a location where Harry and Hermione are pushing their way through the crowd.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione threw themselves into the panicking crowd together.
Hermione cried 'Ron! Ron, where are you?' indicating that Harry is looking for Ron.
Lupin and Tonks appeared in the crowd together, shouting 'Protego!'
Harry seized Hermione's hand to make sure they weren't separated.
